66060b65: What payment methods do you accept?
6c17c762: We accept all major credit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Discover. We also offer alternative payment options such as PayPal and Apple Pay for your convenience.
-6402c99f: How long will it take to receive my order?
-129fa3f8: Delivery times vary depending on your location and the items you've ordered. In general, most orders are processed and shipped within 1-2 business days.
5943422c: Yes, we offer international shipping to select countries. Please note that additional shipping fees and customs duties may apply. Contact our customer service team for more information about shipping options.
6a59f87e: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If for any reason you're not happy with your order, you can return it within 30 days for a full refund or exchange.

-6e293500: Are your products covered by a warranty?
28b5ca24: Yes, all of our products are covered by a warranty against defects in materials and workmanship. The length and terms of the warranty may vary depending on the product.

346e3aa5: Take a look at our products!

-67751e9e: "Our vision at BUDDYBOX is to redefine the standard of luxury in pet care and gifting. We aspire to be the leading global provider of premium pet concierge services and top-quality pet essentials, setting new benchmarks for excellence and innovation. By delivering exceptional, personalized experiences through our bespoke boxes and curated e-store, we aim to enrich the lives of pets and their families, creating a world where every pet is celebrated and cherished.
-6e180f0b: At BUDDYBOX, our mission is to elevate the lives of pets and their families through our luxury concierge and gifting services, and premium e-store offerings. We are dedicated to providing exceptional, personalized care with our bespoke monthly boxes, curated to meet each pet’s unique needs. Our e-store offers a carefully selected range of high-quality treats, chews, and toys, ensuring that every pet enjoys the finest products. By combining luxurious, personalized service with top-tier pet essentials, we aim to enrich the wellbeing of pets, foster joy, and build lasting bonds between pets and their parents.
-4a4a8fac: Celebrate your Pup’s special moments with a customized GiftBox from BUDDYBOX!
-50ce4f90: Surprise the pets you adore with a special GiftBox from BUDDYBOX.
